name: Coven-Ant
description:
Dear Minerva,

It’s time to conjure up a new familiar for our covenant. A Coven-Ant. Alter its tiny head by choosing from our magical stockpile. Items aren’t labeled that clearly, it's the stuff we found in a storage closet. But, that’s why demonic rituals are so fun. Mystery, baby!

The spirit candles will flicker out, sealing the ritual. Finally, you’ll see how your creature stacks up to the other Coven-Ants in our ghoulish gallery.

Sinfully Yours,

Petra
